properties.name: description
properties.description: The first comment on the ticket

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Custom field ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Custom field Value

properties.name: externalId
properties.description: An ID you can use to link Zendesk Support tickets to local records

properties.name: group
properties.description: The group this ticket is assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: recipient
properties.description: The original recipient e-mail address of the ticket

properties.name: subject
properties.description: The value of the subject field for this ticket

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The array of tags applied to this ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: Object of values to set as described here

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: The e-mail address of the assignee

properties.name: customFieldsUi
properties.description: Custom field ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: internalNote
properties.description: Internal Ticket Note (Accepts HTML)

properties.name: publicReply
properties.description: Public ticket reply

properties.name: updateFieldsJson
properties.description: Object of values to update as described here

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: The group to search. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: query
properties.description: Query syntax to search tickets

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a ticket

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a ticket

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a ticket

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many tickets

properties.name: Recover
properties.description: Recover a suspended ticket

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a ticket

properties.name: ticketFieldId
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: name
properties.description: The user's name

properties.name: custom_role_id
properties.description: A custom role if the user is an agent on the Enterprise plan

properties.name: details
properties.description: Any details you want to store about the user, such as an address

properties.name: email
properties.description: The user's primary email address

properties.name: external_id
properties.description: A unique identifier from another system

properties.name: locale
properties.description: The user's locale. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: moderator
properties.description: Whether the user has forum moderation capabilities

properties.name: notes
properties.description: Any notes you want to store about the user

properties.name: only_private_comments
properties.description: Whether the user can only create private comments

properties.name: organization_id
properties.description: The ID of the user's organization. If the user has more than one organization memberships, the ID of the user's default organization. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: phone
properties.description: The user's primary phone number

properties.name: report_csv
properties.description: Whether or not the user can access the CSV report on the Search tab of the Reporting page in the Support admin interface

properties.name: restricted_agent
properties.description: Whether the agent has any restrictions; false for admins and unrestricted agents, true for other agents

properties.name: signature
properties.description: The user's signature. Only agents and admins can have signatures.

properties.name: suspended
properties.description: Whether the agent is suspended. Tickets from suspended users are also suspended, and these users cannot sign in to the end user portal.

properties.name: time_zone
properties.description: The user's time zone

properties.name: userFieldsUi
properties.description: Values of custom fields in the user's profile

properties.name: verified
properties.description: Whether the user's primary identity is verified or not

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: Get Organizations
properties.description: Get a user's organizations

properties.name: Get Related Data
properties.description: Get data related to the user

properties.name: Search
properties.description: Search users

properties.name: domain_names
properties.description: Comma-separated domain names associated with this organization

properties.name: organizationFieldsUi
properties.description: Values of custom fields in the organization's profile

properties.name: Create
properties.description: Create an organization

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Tickets are the means through which your end users (customers) communicate with agents in Zendesk Support

properties.name: Ticket Field
properties.description: Manage system and custom ticket fields

properties.name: User
properties.description: Manage users

properties.name: Organization
properties.description: Manage organizations
